title: gOpura vAsalil dIpam
sahitya:
gOpura vAsalil dIpam teriyudammA kOmagaLE Madurai mAmagaLE ammA


anupallavi

  nArpuram shUzhum kavalai pOdAdO nArpattu mukkONam tanil amarbavaLE un


caraNam 1    eNNamellAm UNil vaittuNarvEnE enakkOr ariya gati kATTi arulvinaiyE
maru pirappilvadu vENDiyadillai un tiruvAna apporuLil kalandiDa vENDumammA
    caraNam 2    pazhagiya un tiru padam tanil nAn azhaguvavE ennai vaittEnE
ihapara sukham tandu nI ennALum aruL pAlitta angayarkkaNNi undan
